Deep within the bowels of a secret laboratory a scientist is on the verge of making an incredible discovery. Dr. Ronald Brown has discovered a way to harness molecular structures so that they can be manipulated. He has developed a hand held device that can literally change the fabric of reality.

This device can take any set of cells and alter them and then reassemble them in any number of given ways. For instance, in one of the experiments conducted by Dr. Brown he was able to take the head of a dog and swap it for the head of a cat. This lasted for a few hours, but since then Dr. Brown was able to make some adjustments so that the effects lasted longer.

Brown was just about to test the new buttons on his device when the door to his laboratory was shoved open and two men in black suits and black sun glasses entered. "Good morning Dr.Brown," the man with the scar on his face said.
Brown spun around, shocked that anyone was able to enter this section of the science building and that this man knew his name.

"How in the hell did you get in here," Brown shouted."That is not important Doctor, what is important is the device you have been working on." Said the man with dirty blonde hair who was standing next to the scar faced man. "We are here to relieve you of your device, it seems that you are reluctant to test it on humans. Our company doesn't have the high ethical standards that you do." Then the man finished his statement and then reached into his suit jacket and produced a gun, and pointed it at the Doctor.

"You fools, this is an untested piece of scientific fiction." Brown stated. "The damage a molecular remodifier could cause if it was unleashed onto the world would be extremely dangerous." The blonde haired man walked over to the doctor and bashed the gun he was holding into the doctor's face and then kicked him in the stomach.

Dr. Brown crashed to the floor in a heap. "My company doesn't give a damn about your silly warnings and neither do I." The blonde headed man bent down and picked up the device that had fallen when the doctor was assaulted. He put it in his pocket and the two man headed toward the exit.

"No" Dr. Brown screamed, "You have no idea of what that device can really do, No!! Then the world went black for Brown.
